      • addGoodEvent

        public void addGoodEvent(java.util.function.Function<GameState,java.lang.String> toAdd)
        Adds an event to this RandomEventManager Events added by this method are deemed 'good' and will be exclusively be selected for the lowest player. Other players will still get these events, though.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - the lambda expression to add

      • getBindings

        public java.util.List<java.util.function.Function<GameState,java.lang.String>> getBindings(boolean onlyGood)
        Gets the lambda function associated with this keybinding if one is available
        Returns:
        The binding if is available, null if no binding was found

                           boolean lowestPlayer)
        Runs a random event that is in this manager
        Parameters:
        datapacket - the Datapacket to use on the lambda
